name: XLV Soccer 23
description:
New game from XLV

XLV Soccer 23

A new soccer game from the "XLV Soccer" series for 2023.

The game is based on the previous game "XLV Soccer 22"

Link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.XLV.XLVSoccer22

The game contains new things like:

Improved graphics

Improved sound

Better gameplay

Option to change the type of ball

Better artificial intelligence

Additional countries for the game

Random player selection option

and more...
